design_philosophy.name: Crystal Command Center
design_philosophy.description: A high-clarity, modular interface that balances enterprise density with consumer-grade usability. Inspired by Odoo's modularity but refined with 'Swiss Style' precision and 'Electric' accents.
core_principles: Bento Grid Everything: All modules are interactive tiles, not static links.
Information Radiators: Tiles display live status (e.g., '2 Unread', 'Checked In 08:00') directly on the surface.
Progressive Disclosure: Complex forms are hidden behind clean summaries.
Tactile Depth: Use subtle borders and soft shadows to create distinct layers, avoiding flat design fatigue.

usage_rules: Use Primary (Violet) for main actions and active states.
Use Secondary (Turquoise) for success states, financial data, and 'growth' metrics.
Use Muted backgrounds for the dashboard canvas to let white cards pop.
NEVER use gradients for text. Keep text high-contrast solid colors.

responsive_rules: Desktop: Three columns (grid-cols-3) as per requirements.
Sidebar: Collapsible on desktop, bottom nav or hamburger on mobile.

DashboardTile.description: The core navigation unit. Not just a button.
DashboardTile.structure: Card > CardHeader (Icon + Title) > CardContent (Live Metric/Status) > CardFooter (Action Link)
DashboardTile.styling: hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200 border-l-4 border-l-primary hover:-translate-y-1 bg-card

VoiceAssistantFAB.description: Floating Action Button for AI Voice Assistant.
VoiceAssistantFAB.styling: h-14 w-14 rounded-full bg-gradient-to-r from-primary to-secondary shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl flex items-center justify-center text-white animate-pulse-slow

StatusBadge.description: For employee status, leave requests, etc.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA (4.5:1). Use 'text-foreground' on 'bg-background'.
accessibility.aria_labels: All icon-only buttons (like the Voice FAB) MUST have aria-label.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the colors provided in this JSON. Do not rely on default Shadcn colors.
2. LAYOUT: Create a 'DashboardLayout' component that handles the responsive sidebar and top bar.
3. TILES: Build a reusable 'ModuleTile' component. It should accept 'title', 'icon', 'metric', 'link', and 'color'.
4. VOICE: Implement the Voice Assistant as a global overlay component triggered by the FAB.
5. DATA: Mock data for the tiles (e.g., 'Payroll: Processed', 'Leave: 2 Days Pending') to demonstrate the 'Live Status' concept.
6. ROUTING: Ensure the 6 modules map to distinct routes (/communication, /admin, etc.).
7. AUTH: Create a clean Login page using the 'login_background' image with a glassmorphism card for the form.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. Use the specific colors and spacing defined here.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for overlays only.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive elements MUST include 'data-testid' attribute.
